description: A server to create drafts of X(Twitter) posts, threads using LLMs and post directly from the chat.

connections.stdioFunction: config => ({command: 'uv', args: ['--directory', config.mcpDirectory, 'run', 'x-mcp'], env: {TWITTER_API_KEY: config.twitterApiKey, TWITTER_API_SECRET: config.twitterApiSecret, TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN: config.twitterAccessToken, TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET: config.twitterAccessTokenSecret}})

mcpDirectory.description: The directory path to the x-mcp repository.

twitterApiKey.description: The API key for the Twitter API.

twitterApiSecret.description: The API secret key for the Twitter API.

twitterAccessToken.description: The access token for the Twitter API.

twitterAccessTokenSecret.description: The access token secret for the Twitter API.
